name: Herbs & Medicinals
description: * These plants must be prepared before use, which requires 1 hour and a DC 10 Intelligence (Nature) check.

results.text: [[1d4]] doses of adderwort which can be prepared to make @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.pn2up6538kaog0ys]{Adderwort Roots}.*
[[1d6]] doses of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.ktsrqn3m6ifjry80]{Fairy Cap}.
[[1d6]] doses of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.ufyph3rlho818mv2]{Ironwood Acorn}.*
[[1d4]] doses of lavender which can be crushed into @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.lamxdxcl7gqxy5zt]{Lavender Paste}.*
10 doses of spiderbulb which can be made into @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.cd4i6cm0e8y35iso]{Pressed Spiderbulb}.*
[[1d4]] doses of sycamore, the petals of which can be made into a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.hkqclpp7pmjyi98l]{Poultice}.*
[[1d6]] doses of yewclaw which can be prepared to make @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.1wsowojgg8hcd5wi]{Dried Yewclaw Bark}.*
1 dose of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.vzy6r3gv8ylwoim7]{Antitoxin}.*

1 rare @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.GKqYSZHIDvZAoCPr]{Magewrist Flower}. When a creature uses a bonus action to inhale the flowerâ€™s magical pollen, the next spell it casts within 1 minute increases in range by one step (from self to touch, touch to short, and so on). The spell must have a casting time of 1 action.

[[2d4]]@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.ypwNnh0SilVb8Dwy]{Flower Blossoms} with healing properties. A creature can use a bonus action to eat one of the blossoms and regain 1d6 hit points.
1 very rare dose of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.tWKaJR5vooO6grM4]{Angelus Root} which can cure any nonmagical disease.*
1 dose of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.e8kpXFx2HP1iO3wq]{Moon Clovers}, which undead cannot come within 10 feet of. Once picked, this plant permanently loses its efficacy in 1 week.

A patch of [[1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.C9nfsa7iIw0zHRje]{Saffron Lilies}. A creature can use a bonus action to eat a saffron lilly and gain resistance to poison damage for one hour.

[[2d4]] @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.D9p8ZZmT6M93X6kJ]{Fireroots}. It takes an hour to crush and prepare one of these warm, red roots, but when ingested they provide immunity to the effects of cold weather until the creature has taken a long rest.
@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.9fwa5w3750ckh4ln]{Leeches} sufficient to fill one jar.
A mix of rare ingredients which can be combined to make a single dose of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.x9t8xc1kffdnm5nz]{Laudanum}.*
Roots which can be pulped to make a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.jpdzbf6ave90ugpq]{Medicinal Salve}.*
A rare combination of plants which form a single @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.yla4i7uz4h58mfqb]{Healing Potion (Basic)}.*
A rare combination of plants which form a single @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.nees9nzonritxzwe]{Healing Potion (Greater)}.*
A rare combination of plants which form a single @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.3gmfg4fsi8abv1ej]{Healing Potion (Superior)}.*
